title: test/bench/shootout: shootout tests talke 30 mins on arm when run via go tool dist test shootout
body:
A few weeks ago they took ~ 1m40
```
##### ../test/bench/shootout
fasta
reverse-complement
nbody
binary-tree
binary-tree-freelist
fannkuch
fannkuch-parallel
Package libpcre was not found in the pkg-config search path.
Perhaps you should add the directory containing `libpcre.pc'
to the PKG_CONFIG_PATH environment variable
No package 'libpcre' found
regex-dna
regex-dna-parallel
spectral-norm
k-nucleotide
k-nucleotide-parallel
mandelbrot
meteor-contest
pidigits
threadring
chameneosredux
1855.90user 9.83system 30:34.56elapsed 101%CPU (0avgtext+0avgdata 35800maxresident)k
0inputs+71552outputs (0major+209564minor)pagefaults 0swaps
```
I don't think this is a compiler regression, `spectral-norm` takes 90% of the time of this test.

/cc @bradfitz
